DOC.brief_summary: This placebo-controlled , double-blind , phase II clinical study evaluate efficacy safety Udenafil patient Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension ( PAH ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Udenafil Patient With Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension ( PAH )
DOC.criteria: • Subjects age 18 follow disease primary Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension secondary Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension cause connective tissue disease [ Phase IIb ] Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension cause congenital heart disease ( include Eisenmenger syndrome ) Subjects pulmonary arterial hypertension cause etiology specify inclusion criterion BMI ( Body Mass Index ) < 18.5kg/m2 Subjects hypotension ( SBP/DBP < 90/50mmHg ) uncontrolled hypertension ( SBP/DBP > 170/100mmHg ) Creatinine clearance ≤ 30mL/min History nonarteritic anterior ischemic optic neuropathy ( NAION )
